title: CHASING THE SUN
body: [Intro] C Am Dm G [Verse 1] C Am Chasing the sun Dm G Chasing the sun for you C Am Spending the day Dm G Driving away the blues C Am And there's nothing like Dm G Losing track of the time, who's countin'? C Am Winding around Dm G Are we up, are we down the mountain? [Interlude] C Am Dm G C Am Dm G [Verse 2] C Am Write a postcard to you Dm G When you're in the other room C Am Just writing to say that I can't find my clothes Dm G If you're lookin for something to do C Am Drop everything I'm doing Dm G Nobody needs me here C Am I'll go wherever you are going Dm G I'll be somewhere near [Verse 3] C Am I can't seem to get anything done Dm G With someone likе you around C Am Everyone's wondering whеre I've gone Dm G Having too much fun, having too much fun C Am Doing nothing, doing nothing Dm G Busy doing, doing nothing C Am Dm G Busy doing, busy doing, doing nothing [Pre-Chorus] C Am Chasing the sun Dm G Chasing the sun for you C Am Spending the day Dm G Driving away the blues [Chorus] C Am Driving away, driving away Dm G Driving away the blues C Am Driving away, driving away Dm G Driving away the blues C Am Driving away, driving away Dm G Driving away the blues [Outro] C Am Dm G C Am Dm G C Am Em G

title: Right Now
body:
D   D                  A         A
It's time to let it go.   You say you understand.
                    G     G                        D        D
Some truth is never known   until you've lost your hand.
                    D     D                        A         A
Until you've had to fight   and waited through the night.
                       G    G                   D        D*
You won't know if it's real   until you have to deal.

[Chorus]
                         G            A
Why'd you have to go and make it weird
                          D            G
saying things you think I need to hear.
                          G             A
I don't need to know what makes it last,
                           D          G
you can slow down, I ain't going fast.
                   E             G*
All those days are done.

[Verse 2]
                      D     D              A         A
We all know that it's hard,   hard to stay   forever
                          G   G                        D        D
but I'm telling you right now   if we're apart or here   together.
               D     D                      A         A
I need to be myself,   I won't live another lie
                          G     G                         D        D*
about the feelings that I have,   I won't be with you and hide.

[End-Chorus]
                         G            A
Why'd you have to go and make it weird
                          D            G
saying things you think I need to hear.
                          G             A
I don't need to know what makes it last,
                           D          G
you can slow down, I ain't going fast.
                   E             G
All those days are done.
                    E                     G
All those times are gone. I'm telling you
                    E
All those times are gone.

[Outro]
                G                   E
I'm telling you right now, right now.
                G                   E
I'm telling you right now, right now.
                G                   E
I'm telling you right now, right now.
                             G            E
I need you to look at me and listen.
                        G                   E             G
I ain't the past coming back to haunt you.
                E                   G
I'm telling you right now, right now.
                E                   G
I'm telling you right now, right now.
                E                   G
I'm telling you right now, right now.
                E                   G
I'm telling you right now, right now.
                E                   G
I'm telling you right now, right now.
                E*
I'm telling you right now, right now.

title: Ive Lied
body:
G                       C
Sitting here in this lonely old guest house

    G            D            G           G7
I’m sure that my life is all through

           G                    C
Scratching fleas and watching a grey mouse

           G           D         G           G7
I’m making love to the memory of you

        G                      C
For without you I’m weak and uncertain

    G         D         G           G7
And I feel so naked and cold

       G                  C
Like a window without any curtains

    G        D          G           G7
My innermost feelings unfold

    C
The drink I just had

                        G       G7
It wasn’t as bad as the first

    C
And drinking won’t do

                          G        D
When it’s only for you I thirst, I thirst

         G                    C
For your kiss it quenches all burning

         G                D           G           G7
And it’s sweeter than the sweetest of wine

           G                  C
Now you’re gone I find myself yearning

        G         D        G           G7
For the love that I left behind

  C
Nobody can heal

                       G       G7
The pain that I feel inside

       C
And if I said I’m strong

                        G       D         G
And I’m never wrong – I lied, I lied... I lied
